title: Webp Lossless format.
body:
From what I can tell when I encode as Webp it generates the webp lossy format.

Is there a way to generate Webp lossless format?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
There might be a way. By default it is the lossy compression when using the `SKImage.Encode` or `SKPixmap.Encode`. However, it appears the each encoder is public and can be used directly. Unfortunately, this has not yet been bound.

The WEBP, PNG and JPG encoders are public in the C++ code and should be visible in the next set of releases after the initial v1.60 release.

comments.author: Potmos
comments.body: Okay thank you I am using the C++ lib for now I will wait for Skiasharp to implement it then.

comments.author: mattleibow
